N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 552.6 - Draft audit report

State Regulations
(a) A draft audit
report shall be issued identifying the items which are being disallowed and
advising the provider of the basis for any proposed actions and the legal
authority for such actions. When feasible, the draft report will also specify
the amount of overpayment or proposed repayment. The draft report may also
include other findings dealing with the provider of service's fiscal, administrative and program activities as well as recommendations to improve
such activities. (b) The draft
audit report shall contain a clear statement of the action to be taken by the
provider of service, shall afford an opportunity to object to the proposed
action within 30 days of the issuance of the report and shall advise that a
failure to respond within the time period allotted may result in the adoption
of the draft report action as the final report. (c) Unless otherwise granted an extension of
time by the Office of Mental Health, the provider of service's response to the
draft report must be mailed within 30 days of receipt of the report, which
shall commence five days from the date of mailing. It shall include a statement
detailing the specific items of the draft report to which the provider of
service objects and provide any additional materials or documentation which the
provider of service wishes to be considered in support of the
objections. Notes
